text: Perhaps an old maid doesn't know much about her or her real disposition, I suppose, that you never dine with me now. #AnneOfGreenGables

passages.fragment: Perhaps an old maid does n't know much about
passages.full_quote: <used>Perhaps an old maid doesn't know much about</used> bringing up a child, but I guess she knows more than an old bachelor

passages.fragment: n't know much about her or her real disposition , I suppose ,
passages.full_quote: You do<used>n't know much about her or her real disposition, I suppose, a</used>nd there's no guessing how a child like that will turn out

passages.fragment: , I suppose , that you never dine with me now
passages.full_quote: "That is the reason, <used>I suppose, that you never dine with me now</used>"
